channel.title: Pi summoning problem
channel.description: Hey My home base people can spawn there summoning at home how can i make it so then cannot have any summon at home?

item.title: Pi summoning problem
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

you can try this:
add this is client.java
search something like public boolean isIngodwars() and add this bellow:

public boolean isInHome() { if((absX >= xxxx && absX <= xxxx && absY >= xxxx && absY <= xxxx)) return true; else return false; }

absX >= (enter minimum x coordinate of your home area) && absX <= (enter maximum x coordinate of your home area) && absY >= (enter minimum x coordinate of your home area) && absY <=(enter maximum x coorditane of you home area)

after that you need to find a solution to remove the summoning when isInHome == true so try to find the code and add something like this:

if (isInHome == true){ sM("summoning is not allow in home") } else{ //your summoning code }

Read full topic
